about.title: 👋 About Me
description: I'm Joe Jigwan, a senior student majoring in Computer Engineering at Kyonggi University. Through various projects such as object detection AI and a RAG-based car assistant, I've developed practical backend skills.

I have applied various technologies in real-world scenarios, including REST API development with Java/Spring Boot, real-time notifications with MongoDB, and deployment on AWS through team projects and capstone experiences.
about.strength1: Experience in designing and deploying RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and AWS
about.strength2: Frontend and full-stack development with React + TypeScript SPA
about.strength3: Implemented object detection model with YOLO + TACO dataset and awarded for thesis
about.strength4: Backend development of RAG-based car assistant system and awarded silver in capstone project

projects.title: 💼 Featured Projects
projects.movie_diary: An AI emotion-based service that analyzes user diaries to classify emotions and recommends movies. Built with React and Flask.
projects.gildongE: A Spring Boot and MongoDB-based car assistant backend system. Handled real-time notifications, consumable replacement calculations, and API deployment.
projects.build_your_health: A React-based health routine management app. Allows users to log status data and manage goal-based routines.
projects.kakao_clone: A KakaoTalk UI clone project from the Nomad Coders Challenge. Selected as an outstanding work. Implemented responsive UI and message list interface using HTML/CSS/JS.
projects.dragonball: A price comparison web service for PC parts
projects.dynamic_scraper: Web crawling practice using BeautifulSoup + Playwright
projects.momentum: A clone of the Momentum app implementing weather, greeting, and to-do list
